description: Numbers n such that n divides the (right) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 22 (most significant digit on right).
comments: This sequence differs from A029515 in that all least significant zeros are removed before concatenation.
links: Lars Blomberg, Table of n, a(n) for a(n) < 10^7
author: Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 24 2001
extensions: Edited and updated by Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 12 2002
